title: Kubearmor: Unleashing the Power of Kubernetes Security
description: Securing your Kubernetes cluster with confidence.

steps.title: Before enforcing the 'Deny execution of package management tools (apt/apt-get)' policy, we can use the 'apt' command to install any application.
After the enforcement of the 'Deny execution of package management tools (apt/apt-get)' policy, we cannot use the 'apt' command to install any application.
